content:
Hi guys, for those with implementations out there, I'd like to put you on a call out slide for existing work out there. I think I know most of you, but please call out if you do/do not want to be included on it.
(NLM - LCH forms will be on there already)
Hi Brian would be happy to have our form builder up on your slide! https://build.augolit.dev/
Hi @Ralph , this looks fantastic - well done!
Thanks Ralph, the conference was last week, but will add it for future sessions
Yep I noticed that after I posted :D . Thanks @Brian Postlethwaite
